overview:
David Lemoine is a digital media exec with expertise in online and mobile media.

David Lemoine started his career as Promotions Manager when he joined Aucland SA (pan-European online auctions) shortly after inception in 1999 ($18M raised).

In 2001, he joined New York-based Zingy as Head of Marketing and employee #1. In 2004, in the early stages of the take-over and Zingy Vindigo merger by Japanese For-Side (for $80M), David signed with Hachette-Filipacchi Media as Director of Product Development in their mobile business unit (later known as Cellfish Media). He oversaw the launch and distribution of mobile product BlingTones (endorsed by hip-hop producer Lil Jon).

He is currently part of the team behind Goldmic the UGC-focused hip hop social network (their partnership w/ Spike Lee made the news in August ‘08).
